Your password must contain lowercase and uppercase letter, number, special character and a minimum length of 8 characters.
Let\'s sign you in to Hechim app
Record all your meditations via external smart watch to get rid of the stress.
Plan your exercise in advance to keep yourself organized and remind yourself at all times.
Record all your exercises to have weekly, monthly overview of your progress and more
Connect with other Hechim users to share your progress, experiences and meet new people
Please select the language for the Hechim app user interface.
Are you sure you want ot change the language to
This app needs several permissions to provide you with it\'s core functionality. You can revoke given permissions at anytime from phone\'s settings.
We need your location permission to display your location on the map and track your activity when the app is opened.
To enable tracking in the background (of your workouts), when the app is not opened and the device is locked for longer periods of time we need access to your background location.

To notify your about your ongoing activity (length, duration, step numbers etc) from notifications, receive notifications about your reports, our latest offers and share your acitivities with other we need your notification permission.
To provide you with step counter functionality, we need your access to your activity recognition.
Enter the code you\'ve received or click the link in your email.
